sections.heading: Fires; failure of city or county authorities to investigate and report; penalty
sections.text: Any officer referred to in section 81-506 who neglects to comply with any of the requirements of sections 81-501.01 to 81-531 shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1925, c. 183, ยง 21, p. 488;C.S.1929, ยง 81-
